actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.
Committee on Finance. Hearings held. Hearings printed: S.Hrg. 102-673.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to make the targeted jobs tax credit available for a 1-year period to employers who hire long-term unemployed individuals.

summary.text: Long-Term Unemployment Reduction Act - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to make the targeted jobs tax credit available for a one-year period to employers who hire long-term unemployed individuals. Requires such individual to be employed by the employer for at least 120 days and at wages up to a specified percentage of certain average wage rates. Requires the employer to take reasonable actions to recruit such individuals in order to qualify for the credit.
